眼鏡を掛ける: (めがねをかける) - to wear glasses; to put on glasses
眼鏡カイマン: (メガネカイマン) - spectacled caiman (Caiman sclerops)
眼鏡梟: (メガネフクロウ) - spectacled owl (Pulsatrix perspicillata)
眼鏡海豚: (メガネイルカ) - spectacled porpoise (Phocoena dioptrica)
眼鏡猿: (メガネザル) - tarsier (Tarsius syrichta); specter lemur; spectre lemur
眼鏡蛇: (めがねへび) - spectacled cobra; Indian cobra; Asian cobra (Naja naja)
眼鏡黐之魚: (メガネモチノウオ) - humphead wrasse (Cheilinus undulatus); Napoleon wrasse; Napoleonfish; Maori wrasse
眼間: (まなかい) - between one's eyes; before one's eyes; space where one's left and right eyesight meet
眼高手低: (がんこうしゅてい) - (yoji) able to criticize but not to create (criticise)
着: (chaku/ki/tsu) - wear , counter for suits of clothing; arriving at ...
着く: (tsuku) - to arrive at, to reach; to sit on, to sit at (ex. a mesa)
着くやいなや: (つくやいなや) - ... had hardly arrived before ...
着くや否や: (つくやいなや) - ... had hardly arrived before ...
着ける: (つける) - to attach/to join/to add/to append/to affix/to stick/to glue/to fasten/to sew on/to apply (ointment); to furnish (a house with); to wear/to put on; to keep a diary/to make an entry; to appraise/to set (a price); to allot/to budget/to assign; to bring alongside; to place (under guard or doctor); to follow/to shadow; to load/to give (courage to); to keep (an eye on); to establish (relations or understanding); to turn on (light)
着け所: (つけどころ) - focus of one's attention; what one is looking for
着こなす: (きこなす) - to wear (clothes) stylishly; to dress oneself stylishly
着こむ: (きこむ) - to wear extra clothes; to dress formally
着す: (じゃくす) - (vs-c,vi)  to insist on; to cling to; to adhere to
着する: (ちゃくする) - to arrive/to reach; to adhere; to insist on; to put on/to wear
着せる: (きせる) - to put clothes on (someone); to plate/to gild/to veneer; to accuse (of some crime)/to give (a bad name)
着せ代える: (きせかえる) - to change clothes (on someone else, e.g. child, doll); to change the wallpaper or skin (of a smart phone, etc.)
着せ替える: (きせかえる) - to change clothes (on someone else, e.g. child, doll); to change the wallpaper or skin (of a smart phone, etc.)
着せ替え人形: (きせかえにんぎょう) - dress-up doll
着たきり雀: (きたきりすずめ) - owning nothing except the clothes on one's back
着た切り雀: (きたきりすずめ) - owning nothing except the clothes on one's back
着つけ: (きつけ) - dressing (esp. in kimono)/fitting/helping someone get dressed; outer garment (in kabuki)
着のみ着のまま: (きのみきのまま) - (with) only the clothes one happens to wear
着の身着のまま: (きのみきのまま) - (with) only the clothes one happens to wear
着の身着の侭: (きのみきのまま) - (with) only the clothes one happens to wear
着の身着の儘: (きのみきのまま) - (with) only the clothes one happens to wear
着ぶくれる: (きぶくれる) - to be thickly clad
着もじ: (ちゃくもじ) - text message or symbol on a busy mobile phone indicating a call arrival (DoCoMo feature)
着る: (きる) - to wear (in modern Japanese, from the shoulders down)/to put on; to bear (guilt, etc.)
着れる: (きれる) - to be able to wear; to fit into
着メロ: (ちゃくメロ) - melodic incoming call tones (esp. mobile telephones); ringtone; ring tone
着付け: (きつけ) - dressing (esp. in kimono)/fitting/helping someone get dressed; outer garment (in kabuki)
着付ける: (きつける) - to put on/to wear; to be used to wearing
着任: (ちゃくにん) - take up a new post
着信: (ちゃくしん) - arrival (e.g. post, signal); receiving/incoming
着信メロディー: (ちゃくしんメロディー) - ring tone
着信局: (ちゃくしんきょく) - receiving post office
着信拒否: (ちゃくしんきょひ) - blocking communications (from a phone number or an e-mail address)
着信者: (ちゃくしんしゃ) - recipient (of a transmission)
着信転送機能: (ちゃくしんてんそうきのう) - call forwarding
着倒れ: (きだおれ) - using up one's fortune on fine clothes
着加入者: (ちゃっかにゅうしゃ) - called party; called subscriber
着古し: (きふるし) - old clothes; cast-off clothes
着古す: (きぶるす) - to wear clothes for a long time; to wear old clothes; to wear out (clothing)
着味: (ちゃくみ) - seasoning (esp. in food industry with additives); flavoring
着味液: (ちゃくみえき) - seasoning solution; flavoring solution
着呼側Ｎアドレス: (ちゃっこがわエンアドレス) - called-(N)-address
着呼側ＮＳ利用者: (ちゃっこがわエンエスりようしゃ) - called NS user
着呼側ＳＳ利用者: (ちゃっこがわエスエスりようしゃ) - called SS user
着呼側ＴＳ利用者: (ちゃっこがわティーエスりようしゃ) - called TS user
着呼受付不可信号: (ちゃっこうけつけふかしんごう) - call-not-accepted signal
着呼受付信号: (ちゃっこうけつけしんごう) - call-accepted signal
着回: (きまわし) - mixing and matching (clothes, accessories, etc.); wearing of an item of clothing in many different combinations
着回し: (きまわし) - mixing and matching (clothes, accessories, etc.); wearing of an item of clothing in many different combinations
着地点: (ちゃくちてん) - landing place (for aircraft); common ground/compromise/agreement/conclusion
着太り: (きぶとり) - (clothes which) make one look fat
着実: (ちゃくじつ) - steady; sound; trustworthy; solid
着尺: (きじゃく) - standard length of material used in a kimono
着尺地: (きじゃくじ) - standard length of material used in a kimono; roll of material
着岸: (ちゃくがん) - reaching the shore; docking a boat
着崩れ: (きくずれ) - worn out of shape
着帯: (ちゃくたい) - wearing a maternity belt
着帽: (ちゃくぼう) - putting on one's hat
着床前死亡: (ちゃくしょうぜんしぼう) - preimplantation death
着弾距離: (ちゃくだんきょり) - in (gunshot) range
着御: (ちゃくぎょ) - (ant: 発御) arrival (of the emperor, etc.)
着心地: (きごこち) - (good or bad) feel when wearing something
